UPDATE store_pu_stock_running_water
store_product_unit_id = #{storeProductUnitId},
product_unit_serial_number = #{productUnitSerialNumber},
commodity_product_unit_name = #{commodityProductUnitName},
preoperative_stock_num = #{preoperativeStockNum},
operation_back_stock_num = #{operationBackStockNum},
stock_change = #{stockChange},
create_userid = #{createUserid},
create_username = #{createUsername},
create_userip = #{createUserip},
create_usermac = #{createUsermac},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
preoperative_real_stock_num = #{preoperativeRealStockNum},
operation_back_real_stock_num = #{operationBackRealStockNum},
type = #{type},
order_code = #{orderCode},
WHERE id = #{id}
